page.title: 03Transport, Wickhambreaux.
page.content: The{Stodmarsh}area has one offical bus stop; the bus stops at the {Stodmarsh Red Lion}on{Wednesdays}and {Saturdays}at{10.24, 13.14, 14.24}and {18.02.}The railway line that runs through this area runs from{Minster to{Sturry.}A small part of this line used to serve{Chislet}coal mine when it was still worked. There is only one main road and that is the{main A28,}(only a two lane road) on the north side of the {River Stour}and railway line; a frequent bus service uses this road. Most of the roads are narrow and winding and often lorries cannot pass on them. As most of this area is so poorly served by public transport most people use cars. Mothers and children frequently walk or cycle.
